description: Second sheet of CalGreen mandatory measures checklist covering pollutant control (VOC limits for adhesives, sealants, coatings), formaldehyde limits, indoor air quality/exhaust requirements, environmental comfort, moisture control, composite wood products, and installer/special inspector qualifications. Includes APPROVED stamp from Building Plan Check.
key_content: VOC limits table for adhesives: Indoor Carpet 50 g/L, Wood Flooring 100 g/L, Multipurpose Construction 70 g/L
VOC limits table for sealants: Architectural 250 g/L, Non-Membrane Roof 300 g/L
Interior paint VOC limits: Flat 50 g/L, Non-flat 50 g/L, Primers 100 g/L
Formaldehyde limits per CARB ATCM for HWPW, particleboard, MDF
Indoor air quality: exhaust fans ENERGY STAR rated, ducted to exterior
Moisture control: vapor retarder required at concrete slab per CBC 1907.1
Installer and special inspector qualification requirements
APPROVED stamp signed by Anthony Montez — Building Plan Check

NOT SHOWN: construction waste diversion percentage
